name: Panic (woahitsjeff)
description:
"Panic" - for Ludum Dare 50

Sometimes you have to face your biggest fears, whether snakes, storms, bungie jumping, or even people. You take on the job of a delivery person, but in this gated community, there are a bit too many folks for your comfort. Challenge yourself to deliver as many items as possible before the inevitable happens.

CONTROLS

  • WASD to move
  • LSHIFT to sprint
  • SPACEBAR to jump

P.S. The web version is the version with the latest fixes. The downloadable version is the LDJAM submission.
